Interrupts.Name: Cut Deal
Interrupts.Trigger: A character in range 3 of the Hob gains a status.
Interrupts.Effects: The Hob transfers the status to itself or another character in range 3 of the Hob. A foe can save to avoid gaining a status from this effect.

Actions.Name: The Old Magic
Actions.Effects: The Hob inflicts all statuses it is currently suffering from on its foe, then deals 2 damage, once, per status its foe is afflicted by.

Actions.Name: Yank Thread
Actions.Effects: A foe in range 4 is branded. Branded foes are shoved 2 in any direction.

Actions.Name: Fairy Knot
Actions.Description: The Hob chooses an ally in range 6. That ally can immediately activate any Delay effects it is holding OR immediately regain the use of an interrupt.

Actions.Name: Marry
Actions.Description: The Hob marks any two non-summon characters.
Actions.Mark: Any time these characters are in within range 3 of each other, both are pacified+. A marked character can end this mark on both characters by using an action to blow a kiss at the other character, or by spending their entire turn not attacking.

Actions.Name: Haste
Actions.Description: An ally in range 6 is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they gain +1 action and double their speed.
